sentence.Network_en: His government began to unravel because of a banking scandal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的政府由于一起金融丑闻而开始瓦解。

sentence.Network_en: A young mother has flown to Iceland to unravel the mystery of her husband's disappearance.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位年轻的母亲飞抵冰岛，要揭开她丈夫失踪之谜。

sentence.Network_en: He was good with his hands and could unravel a knot or untangle yarn that others wouldn't even attempt.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的手很灵巧，其他人甚至都不敢尝试的一些难解的绳结或缠在一起的纱线，他都能解开。

Findings from developmental biology have helped unravel some of this mystery ., 发育生物学上的发现 , 帮助我们解开部份的谜题.
At warmer temperatures , acids unravel and cell membranes quickly dissolve ., 在更高温度下 , 核酸会散开 , 细胞膜也会迅速溶解.

entry.def: If something such as a plan or system unravels, it breaks up or begins to fail.

example.ex: His government began to unravel because of a banking scandal...
example.tran: 他的政府由于一起金融丑闻而开始瓦解。

example.ex: When she returned to America, the marriage unravelled.
example.tran: 她回到美国的时候，婚姻破裂了。

entry.def: If you unravel something that is knotted, woven, or knitted, or if it unravels, it becomes one straight piece again or separates into its different threads.

example.ex: He was good with his hands and could unravel a knot or untangle yarn that others wouldn't even attempt...
example.tran: 他的手很灵巧，其他人甚至都不敢尝试的一些难解的绳结或缠在一起的纱线，他都能解开。

example.ex: The stairway carpet is so frayed it threatens to unravel.
example.tran: 铺在楼梯上的地毯磨损得很厉害，都快散了。

entry.def: If you unravel a mystery or puzzle, or if it unravels, it gradually becomes clearer and you can work out the answer to it.

example.ex: A young mother has flown to Iceland to unravel the mystery of her husband's disappearance...
example.tran: 一位年轻的母亲飞抵冰岛，要揭开她丈夫失踪之谜。

example.ex: Gradually, with an intelligent use of flashbacks, Yves' story unravels.
example.tran: 通过巧妙运用倒叙手法，伊夫的故事慢慢呈现出来。

means.word_mean: 1. become or cause to become undone by separating the fibers or threads of;

auth_sentence.content: If inflation expectations get too high things could unravel.
auth_sentence.res_content: If inflation expectations get too high things could unravel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If inflation expectations get too high things could unravel.

auth_sentence.content: The social compact is starting to unravel in many countries.
auth_sentence.res_content: The social compact is starting to unravel in many countries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The social compact is starting to unravel in many countries.

auth_sentence.content: Krane's life, meanwhile, had started to unravel.
auth_sentence.res_content: Krane's life, meanwhile, had started to unravel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Krane's life, meanwhile, had started to unravel.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"不,无,非,没有"; 2. 表示"打开,解开,弄出"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 新奇的, 不熟悉的, 没有经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不,无,非,没有+familiar熟悉的→adj.新奇的, 不熟悉的, 没有经验的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不宜的, 不顺利的, 相反的, 令人不快的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不,无,非,没有+favorable赞成的, 有利的, 赞许的, 良好的→adj.不宜的, 不顺利的, 相反的, 令人不快的
un不,无,非,没有+known知道→adj.不知道的, 未知的 n.不知名的
un不,无,非,没有+official官方的→adj.非官方的
un不,无,非,没有+real真实的→adj.不真实

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未受损伤的,未遭伤害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不,无,非,没有+scathe损害,伤害+ed……的→adj.未受损伤的,未遭伤害的
un不,无,非,没有+scrupulosu小心的→adj.肆无忌惮的
un不,无,非,没有+toward顺利的→不顺的
un不,无,非,没有+worldly世间的→adj.非尘世的
un不,无,非,没有+abashed难为情的→adj.不害臊的
un不,无,非,没有+act扮演+ed表形容词→adj.未演出的
un不,无,非,没有+alloy合金,混合+ed……的→没混合的
un不,无,非,没有+ambitious有雄心的→adj.无野心的
un不,无,非,没有+assuming自以为是的→adj.不摆架子的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无常的, 不确定的, 不可预测的, 靠不住的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+certain肯定的→不确定的

un不,无,非,没有+conditional有条件的→adj.无条件的
un不,无,非,没有+conscionable凭良心的;明智的→adj.无节制的
un不,无,非,没有+countable可计算的→adj.无数的, 不可数的
un不,无,非,没有+daunt沮丧+ed……的→没被吓倒的
un不,无,非,没有+decided决定的→adj.未决定的

un不,无,非,没有+doubt怀疑+ed……的→adj.无疑的, 确实的

un不,无,非,没有+equal平等的→adj.不平等的
un不,无,非,没有+failing有尽头;失败的→没有尽头的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不适宜的, 不适当的

means.word_mean: 阐明,阐释；说明；澄清；弄清楚,变得清楚易懂

sentences.en: The legal tangle was never really unravelled.
sentences.cn: 这起法律纠葛从来没有真正解决。
